actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to facilitate the establishment of child care centers at Department of Veterans Affiars medical facilities.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to convert space in Department of Veterans Affairs facilities for use as child care centers without reimbursement. (Currently, such conversion is permitted only on a reimbursable basis.)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to facilitate the establishment of child care centers at Department of Veterans Affiars medical facilities.
